Description:
Detects direct access to raw pastes in different paste services often used by malware in their second stages to download malicious code in encrypted or encoded form

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Raw Paste Service Access
Query: (c-uri="*.paste.ee/r/*" OR c-uri="*.pastebin.com/raw/*" OR c-uri="*.hastebin.com/raw/*" OR c-uri="*.ghostbin.co/paste/*/raw/*" OR c-uri="*pastetext.net/*" OR c-uri="*pastebin.pl/*" OR c-uri="*paste.ee/*")
